Localization.Name: FL-22 Cannon
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Kroneg
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 2

Deliver massive damage from a distance with Kroneg's FL line of laser cannons. The size two FL-22 shines at medium and long ranges thanks to a design that minimizes damage falloff.
